code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./TitleScreen.css';import bgMusic from'./Music/bgMusic.mp3';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TitleScreen=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const audio=new Audio(bgMusic);audio.loop=true;audio.play();return()=>{audio.pause();audio.currentTime=0;};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"title-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"Maze Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subtitle",children:"Navigate 2D mazes, conquer grid challenges, and gather delicious food."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"link-container"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"glitch-button1-containers",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/menu",className:"btn-glitch-fill",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"glitch-text",children:"Play a game"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/instructions",className:"btn-glitch-fill",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"glitch-text",children:"How to play"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/aboutus",className:"btn-glitch-fill",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"glitch-text",children:"About us"})})]})]});};export default TitleScreen;
